Name: 狂の世界-Crazy World-
About the game: 1. overview After work, head to the station near the last train. However, something is wrong. I get on the train thinking so. Beyond that, a crazy different world full of death, madman and monsters awaited. There was a girl who got lost in another world as well as wandering in another world. She manages to find a way out of her and return to her original world with her girl. 2. Game content ⑴ It is necessary to explore another world and find a means of escape while hiding yourself from madmen and monsters (in the grass, under a table, in a locker, etc.) or temporarily incapacitating with a gun. ⑵ The heroine girl has a good feeling. Increase her liking by having proper conversations and giving away recovery items and lost items. ⑶ If you eat or drink something from another world, the 'Yomotsuhegui value' will accumulate, and if this accumulates above a certain level, you will not be able to return to the original world. This applies not only to players but also to heroines. ⑷ There are three difficulty levels, easy, normal, and hard, and the amount of recovery items recovered, the amount of ammunition obtained, and the heroine are different. ⑸ Heart items (5 for each difficulty level) for releasing the heroine's swimsuit costume are placed at various places on the stage.
